name: The Great Fear
description:
The Great Fear will make you plunge into an atmosphere of horror and hopelessness. For salvation, you can only rely on yourself.


The Great Fear is an immersive computer game where players find themselves trapped in a mysterious laboratory. As an unwitting subject of twisted experiments, your goal is to navigate the closed room and uncover clues to escape.

Explore space while discovering the dark secrets behind the experiments. Beware of lurking dangers and the ever-present sense of isolation.

Will you conquer the enigma and secure your freedom, or become another tragic victim of this haunting facility?
The choice is yours in this thrilling escape adventure.
